Prep materials for this are found in your Jekyll template

Prep materials for this are found in your Jekyll template

  1. See the _example_projects, especially 2_vega_plots_four_ways.md and 3_more_complex_python_with_altair.md
  2. The .json files for each of these is stored in the assets/json directory in your template
  3. See the prep notebook links for the code for how the Altair plots we will go over this week are made.
